info.name: GPokr - midnight
info.additionalInfo: This also styles its affiliated sites KDice and XSketch. I haven't played those games, but, the sites seem to be structured the same, so, I added them to the mix as well. Also available on greasyfork My scrollbars are styled by auto-hidden minimal scrollbars for Firefox by freecyber My web browser of choice is Pale Moon My userstyle manager is Stylem
